section.title: Function
section.p: Along with derby.authentication.ldap.searchAuthDN, indicates how should bind with the directory server to do searches in order to retrieve a fully qualified user DN (distinguished name). This property specifies the password; derby.authentication.ldap.searchAuthDN specifies the DN to use for the search.
For more information about LDAP user authentication, see "LDAP directory service" in the .

section.title: Default
section.p: If not specified, an anonymous search is performed if it is supported.

codeblock.b: -- system-wide property derby.authentication.ldap.searchAuthPW=guestPassword -- database-wide property CALL SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_SET_DATABASE_PROPERTY( 'derby.authentication.ldap.searchAuthPW', 'guestPassword')

section.title: Dynamic or static
section.p: Static. For system-wide properties, you must reboot for the change to take effect. For database-wide properties, you must reboot the database for the change to take effect.
